website_summaries.verdict: This machine gives you the quality of a conical burr grinder with fewer bells and whistles than more expensive models.
pros: Adjustable razor gives precise dose control
60 settings for everything from fine espresso to coarse French press
Removable grinds tray and dosing compartment
Amazing grind range and dose control
Arms at bottom are designed to hold a standard espresso machine grounds holder
cons: No way to set the grind time

customer_reviews.title: Not worth a money
customer_reviews.text: I've used multiple grinders so far. Including a manual one (as a backup). Good espresso = fresh beans + precise grind + precise portion. While you can always measure beans before grinding every other electric grinder has a simple option to set the timer. I was shocked to realize that 2x expensive Breville doesn't provide this option. Noise level is high (not a deal-breaker though). The grinder is quite bulky (I can live with that). But not having a timer is a bummer
customer_reviews.author: Roman Klimenko

customer_reviews.title: Perfect grind every time!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second grinder as I have one for regular beans and this for decaffeinated beans. I am all about the Breville! Great products and top tier customer service. This machine grinds perfectly from power to pebbles with nothing mixed going on. I’ve been able to really fine tune it to what works best for our perfect cup of coffee (espresso really) Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: C. J. Gandy

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: So bummed with this product! Would not recommend. Have been trying to get in contact with Breville, but have been unsuccessful. We use this every morning for espresso, and after 10 months it broke! We clean it regularly and take good care of it. We’re so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Brigid Rushe

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 9 months
customer_reviews.text: While it worked, it was great. As it was dying, it inteterestingly started grinding according to the provided dial scale, which was apparently out of calibration. We had set it at 15 to get an acceptable grind for espresso and it would not grind at all below ten on the scale (0-5 is the listed espresso range). I don't buy extended warranties because I don't like to deal with BS trying to get support. Instead I buy products I expect to last and write reviews when they don't. Breville, you let me down.
customer_reviews.author: Frank T. Willmore

customer_reviews.title: Great value, simple machine.
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a decaf grinder for my espresso machine and it’s great. Seems consistent but there’s no way to adjust dosage for set amounts, purely an on/off machine. For some reason it’s messier than my other grinder but for the price it’s a great setup. Pretty quiet. One gripe is the bean hopper is small, maybe 8 ounces of beans will fit. My other machine holds at least 12 but it’s slightly taller.
customer_reviews.author: Roswell Underwood

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be the Canadian Version - I ordered and will let everyone know how it turns out.
customer_reviews.author: Grant M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good , consistent grinder for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. Doesn't have the bells and whistles that the pro has but does give a consistent grind. Completely changed the flavor of my shots.
customer_reviews.author: Kinnie Alford

customer_reviews.title: Happy!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! It is adjustable on the fly, beans do not need to be removed from the hopper , very accurately drops ground coffee into my portafilter without much spillage at all. I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Roger K Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Clean, simple coffee grinder
customer_reviews.text: Loved this clean, simple grinder that is fantastic at grinding from espresso to french press and anywhere in between.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin I.

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting this not to grind very fine, but it actually grind too fine almost to a powder. So I just dial it down to more coarse because too fine is not good for espresso. Apparently there are a few DUMB reviews that makes people think twice about buying this. Please ignore those. This is a good expresso grinder AND its a good price. Perfect for me because I don't want a digital screen and bells and whistles, its stupid unless you have a coffee shop You just push to start and push to stop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... my first Burr grinder but it seems to work excellent grinds fine for espresso and does a good job ...
customer_reviews.text: I returned this grinder because it had no feature to set the grind time it's completely manual Breville doesn't even show this grinder on their product line it's some kind of Canadian piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Old coffee grinds remain in grinder, ruining the point of a fresh morning grind
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: After ayear of daily use I have realized that the portion under the bird that pushes the ground coffee does a very poor job, leaving behind lots of coffee and fines every time. This means, every morning when I wake up and grind my beans fresh, I’m getting old stale coffee. In order to clear the whole thing out you have to remove the bottom burner and poke around in there and then tap it upside down. This is impractical and not worth the money. Old: So far so good. Sturdy, quite capabale for espresso. Tough to clean
customer_reviews.author: jsoulful

customer_reviews.title: Beware: poor support from maker.
customer_reviews.text: Product broke down after couple years of light use and company website would not forward messages. Would not recommend this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Denny P.

product_meta.title: Breville BCG400SIL the Dose Control Coffee-Grinder
product_meta.description:
Achieve robust and aromatic coffee with Breville's The Dose Control Pro Coffee Grinder. It gives coffee lovers optimal control over freshly roasted beans for the best tasting cup of Joe you've ever had in your life.

At the heart of this grinder are stainless steel conical burrs which minimize grind heat and protect essential oils which are the essence of flavorful coffee.

60 Grind Settings

The Breville The Dose Control Pro Coffee Grinder 60 precise grind settings to cover a wide grinding range of fineness--from ultra-fine Turkish to coarse for all kinds of coffee preparation.

Setting vary among each brew method including Espresso, Percolator, Drip, or French Press.

Adjustable Razor Dose Trimming Tool

For consistent extraction, the adjustable razor dose trimming tool lets you to trim the puck to the right level. Choose the right width blade of the razor to match the diameter of your filter basket.

The adjustable razor includes 58mm, 54mm, and 50mm blades.

Simple Operation

You don't need to be professional barista to operate Breville's The Dose Control Pro Coffee Grinder. It features an easy to use grind time dial so you can get your coffee grounds ready for preparing your ideal cup of coffee.

With a compact, sleek looking design and reliable coffee brewing performance, the Dose Control Pro Coffee Grinder turns your kitchen into an at home coffee bar!
